com.tyrlib2.collision

Class CollisionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.collision.CollisionGroup

  • public class CollisionGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a group of objects which can collide with each other and need therefore be checked for collision.
